title: My FPS is unstable after i patch 8.2?
body:
Why my FPS become unstable after I patch my league to 8.2 ??? it just lags me every single time when I go into a fight ... I can't play like this as an ADC.
How can I fix it ?? Anybody knows ?? please help me ??

replies.body: Be sure to check for any driver updates of course, but I would also check to see if any background programs like Discord or something might be interfering with the game. Sometimes you may also need to repair certain game files if the patch didn't work 100%, so it'd be worth the time to try a quick repair as well.

I'm also having this problem. I lock frames to 60, my monitor doesn't go past that, game seems to start at 55-60, drops to the 40-45 range when csing and about 25 when fighting. The game is literally unplayable.
I tried:
-set in game graphics as low as possible
-ran a troubleshoot
-defrag my drives
-ran CCleaner
No luck here.


The only thing I had open in the background this whole time is Discord and that is a normal thing for me, I can usually play music on youtube with no trouble.

I hope this is looked into soon.



Edit: It appears to have sorted itself out over time. I took a nap, restarted my computer and tried again.
Its not your PC, its LOL. Its the Patch.
Have same problem,,, after instaling patch 8.2 my fps drop down +- 15-40. I begin to think that the game is a matter of money (P2W). Thank you for your correction RIOT.
your right its not PC its the LoL newest patch.. i having this problem too i update all drivers, direct, repair a game and also reinstall wont help me... i hope new patch will repair this.
Fps drop from 100 - 140 to 30-15 after update . And "checking driver updates" dont make any sense for me cuz i played with last version of them tilll update 8.2 with normal fps.

My brother has this same issue.
-Updated Drivers
-Repaired
-Fresh install

Still freezes randomly. Usually during combat. Making it pvp unplayable.

Now the question is, what is the connection between us? I play on the EUW from Germany. Have a laptop with a Geforce. So far, Riot has made no comment in any thread. One has written only that he should control the drivers, etc. What total nonsense is.

I'm having the same problem since one week (could be with patch 8.3), i have checked and i haven't any driver or windows pending update.
What i have noticed is that NVidea Geforge Experience doesn't find Lol between the installed game on my pc, a few months ago, as i remember, lol was between them.

Usually i have 60 fps, now i have 15 ~ 59

I have tryed to reduce the game quality but no always the fps drops continuously.... any update from riot?

I have readed the post about Swain, but i have this frape drop also when Swain isn't in game, on the rift rivals and in aram
